casebody.data:
MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

98-583. San v. Scherer.

Franklin App. Nos. 97APE03-317 and 97APE03-318. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of the joint application for dismissal,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the application for dismissal be, and hereby is, granted, and the appeal of Perry San and Martin Wagner is dismissed.

ACCORDINGLY, IT IS FURTHER ORDERED by the court that this cause be, and hereby is, dismissed.
